name: The Repetitive Dream of Saving Dream
name_original: The Repetitive Dream of Saving Dream
description:
Created as a submission for the 72-hour Mini Jam 105: Dreamy, with limitation for the jam consisting of "every playthrough is unique".

The game consists of a platform jumper with the goal of saving 3 different randomly selected "Dreams" over the course of an endless number of 3 different randomly selected levels, while facing 3 different, randomly selected obstacles...all the while playing 3 different, randomly selected players - each of which have 3 different specific abilities (speed, jump height, and the ability to double-jump).

The controls are: left/right arrows keys for movement and space to jump/double jump. Pressing Q while in a level exits back to the start screen.

Contains music ©2021 Joshua Mclean (http://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International.
